snippet: Delays in Exxon Mobil’s response to a major pipeline break beneath Yellowstone River made an oil spill much worse than it otherwise would have been, Department of Transportation investigators said in a new report.
abstract: Department of Transportation investigators say delays in Exxon Mobil’s response to major pipeline break beneath Montana's Yellowstone River made oil spill much worse than it otherwise would have been.
lead_paragraph: Delays in Exxon Mobil’s response to a major pipeline break beneath Yellowstone River made an oil spill much worse than it otherwise would have been, Department of Transportation investigators said in a new report.

headline.seo: Montana: Exxon Faulted for Response to Spill
headline.main: Montana: Exxon Faulted for Response to Spill
headline.print_headline: Montana: Exxon Faulted For Response To Spill
